dashboard.title: Your City at a Glance
dashboard.subtitle: Here you can find your city's dashboards

dashboards.title: Your City at a Glance
dashboards.subtitle: Here you can find the dashboards of your city. The dashboards present thematically related datasets visually and in context. They enable decision-making and understanding.

addDashboard.title: Add Dashboard
addDashboard.subtitle: Here you can create new dashboards

findData.title: Find Data
findData.subtitle: Here you can find all datasets available on the platform

analyzeData.title: Analyze Data
analyzeData.subtitle: Here you can analyze your datasets

hof-lp-header.title: Innovation Space Hofer Land
hof-lp-header.subtitle: Utilize the Digital Twin, innovative dashboards, and the data catalog for comprehensive analysis and insights into the data landscape of the Hofer Land.

digital-twin.title: Digital Twin
digital-twin.description: A digital twin is a virtual copy of the city for planning and management.

dashboards.title: Dashboards
dashboards.description: Dashboards are interactive overviews of key data and metrics.

data-catalog.title: Open Data Catalog
data-catalog.description: A data catalog is a publicly accessible, searchable collection of all data.

hof-lp-digital-twin.title: The Digital Twin for Intelligent Urban Planning
hof-lp-digital-twin.description: The digital twin of a city provides a virtual representation of its entire ecosystem, including infrastructure and citizens. This technology allows urban development to be planned, analyzed, and optimized.

hof-lp-dashboards.title: Use Dashboards to Capture Data Insights
hof-lp-dashboards.description: The dashboards on our platform provide clear insights into data, enabling informed decisions for city development.

hof-lp-datacatalog.title: Work with Open Data and Data from Participating Organizations
hof-lp-datacatalog.description: The data catalog provides access to a variety of open data as well as data provided by participating organizations, supporting comprehensive data analysis and usage.

partners.description1: An mFUND-funded research project of the BMDV
partners.description2: implemented by the project partners DKSR and Fraunhofer FOKUS

discover-data.title: Discover the Municipal DataWorks
discover-data.box-one-text: View Open Data of your city as a citizen
discover-data.box-two-text: View reliable and restrictive data as a data provider

open-data.title: Open Data and restrictive data from participant organizations
open-data.description: The data catalog enables access to a wide range of Open Data as well as data provided by participating organizations, supporting comprehensive data analysis and usage.
open-data.box-one-text: Digital public services through a secure platform for the exchange of diverse data.
open-data.box-two-text: Legal and technical security through the development of access rights
open-data.box-three-text: High data quality and reliability through regular maintenance of the data catalog
open-data.box-four-text: Open Data access for interested and engaged citizens who want to be involved in city development

discover-data-detailed.main-description: This platform integrates data from more than eight different categories, enabling a comprehensive understanding of topics such as economic and social developments, climate changes and adaptations, as well as concrete urban and regional development. The goal is to support a socio-ecological market economy through clear data visualization and processing.
discover-data-detailed.get-started-one-title: Companies in the Renewable Energy Sector

get-in-touch.title: Get in Touch
get-in-touch.text: Send us your application or schedule a meeting with us so that we can show you the platform.

sitemap.open-data: Open Data und restriktive Daten von Teilnehmerorganisationen
sitemap.how-to: How Do You Get Your KDW?

DataExchangeHeaderReqInfo.first-line: The datasets you have requested from other organizations
DataExchangeHeaderReqInfo.second-line: Here you will find datasets that your organization has requested from other organizations.
DataExchangeHeaderReqInfo.link-text: Learn more about how you can request datasets

KHeadline.datacatalog-text: Explore, analyze, and share important data. Learn more about data types and collaboration on the platform.

header.title: Legal Information and Data Protection
header.description: Welcome to our section for legal information and data protection. Here you will find all the essential details about our imprint, legal notices, and our privacy policy. These pages are designed to provide transparency about the operation of our website and to explain how we handle your personal data.

notice.heading: Legal Notice
notice.paragraph1: All rights reserved. Texts, images, graphics, sound, animations, and videos, as well as their arrangement on this website, are subject to copyright and other protection laws. The content of this website may not be copied, distributed, modified, or made accessible to third parties for commercial purposes.
notice.paragraph2: Our website may contain links to other providers' websites. Despite careful and regular checks, we do not assume any liability for the content of external links. We have no influence on the design and content of the sites we link to. If you want to visit such websites, you should observe the respective applicable notices. We are not responsible for the privacy standards and practices of other providers. If you become aware of illegal content or practices of external links, we kindly ask you to inform us immediately.
notice.paragraph3: Furthermore, we use Google Analytics, a web analysis service from Google. Google Analytics uses cookies (small text files) that are stored on your computer and enable an analysis of your use of the website. The information generated by the cookie about your use of this website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by a Google server in the USA. Google will use this information to evaluate your use of the website, compile reports on website activity for website operators, and provide other services relating to website and internet usage. Google may also transfer this information to third parties if required by law or if third parties process this data on behalf of Google. Under no circumstances will Google associate your IP address with other data held by Google. You can prevent the installation of cookies by adjusting your browser software settings; however, we must inform you that in this case, you may not be able to use all the functionalities of this website. By using our website, you consent to the processing of data collected about you by Google in the manner and for the purposes described above.

digital-twin-view.digital-twin-subtitle: The city's digital twin offers a virtual representation of the city and, for example, digitally displays data on buildings, infrastructure and nature. {break}This technology allows planning, analysis, and optimization of urban development.

DKSRAppsView.title: DKSR Analysis Tools
DKSRAppsView.subtitle: Here you can find use case-specific data analysis tools

heatwaves.title: Understanding Heatwaves
heatwaves.content: Heatwaves are dangerously hot periods that increase health risks. Understanding their severity factors helps planners and citizens improve urban heat resilience and reduce casualties.

bikePlanner.title: Bike Lane Planner
bikePlanner.content: This experimental tool could help city planners quickly test various strategies for placing new bike lanes.

heatActions.title: Planning Heatwave Actions
heatActions.content: Cities face the risk of heatwaves and must invest in new infrastructure. Our tool organizes data to simplify decision-making and explore solutions.

heatRisk.title: Heatwave Risk Areas
heatRisk.content: Cities face the risk of heatwaves and must invest in new infrastructure. Our tool organizes data to simplify decision-making and explore solutions.

accessUrl.info: This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset.

status.label: Status
status.info: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle. It MUST take one of the values Completed, Deprecated, Under Development, Withdrawn.
status.help: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle.

packageFormat.label: Package Format
packageFormat.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
packageFormat.help: The format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together.

compressFormat.label: Compress Format
compressFormat.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
compressFormat.help: The format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form.

checksum.label: Checksum
checksum.info: This property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed. The checksum is related to the downloadURL.
checksum.help: The checksum is related to the downloadURL.

mediaType.label: Media Type
mediaType.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official

datasetDescription.label: Description of the Dataset
datasetDescription.info: The main description of the dataset. It is often displayed with the package title. In particular, it should start with a short sentence that describes the data set succinctly, because the first few words alone may be used in some views of the data sets.

keywordHeader.label: Keywords to describe the dataset
keywordHeader.info: Terms that may link this dataset to similar ones. Keywords must be lowercase alphanumeric characters or symbols: -_. Words in phrases should be connected with a hyphen. e.g. pollution, rivers, water-quality

contributor.help: This property refers to bodies or persons who have edited the data (e.g. by formatting it). Its use is described in more detail in the Manual of Conventions.

contributor.label: Contributor

originator.help: This property refers to the persons who have copyright in the data set. According to copyright law, a work is protected if it is the personal intellectual creation of its author.
originator.info: This property refers to the persons who have copyright in the data set. According to copyright law, a work is protected if it is the personal intellectual creation of its author.
originator.label: Originator

maintainer.help: This property refers to the bodies or individuals who take responsibility and accountability for the data and its appropriate maintenance.
maintainer.info: This property refers to the bodies or individuals who take responsibility and accountability for the data and its appropriate maintenance.
maintainer.label: Maintainer

references.help: This property can be used to refer to reference datasets such as a High Value Dataset (HVD) or a sample dataset of the sample data catalogue.
references.info: This property can be used to refer to reference datasets such as a High Value Dataset (HVD) or a sample dataset of the sample data catalogue.
references.label: References

creatorEmail.placeholder: Email address of the catalogue creator

language.help: A language used in the textual metadata describing titles, descriptions, etc.

availabilityCatDE.info: Stands for the availabilty of the catalogue

spatial.help: This property refers to a geographical area covered by the Catalogue.
spatial.info: This property refers to a geographical area covered by the Catalogue.

hasPart.label: Has Part
hasPart.help: This property refers to a related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue
hasPart.info: This property refers to a related Catalogue that is part of the described Catalogue.

creator.help: The entity responsible for producing the catalogue
creator.info: This property refers to the entity responsible for producing the catalogue

hasPartURL.help: Link to catalog that is part of the described catalog.

creatorHomepage.label: Homepage
creatorHomepage.help: This property refers to the homepage of the creator.
creatorHomepage.info: This property refers to the homepage of the creator.

issued.info: This property contains the date on which the description of the Dataset was included in the Catalogue.
issued.label: Issued
issued.help: This property contains the date on which the description of the Dataset was included in the Catalogue.

title.label: Title
title.help: A name given to the Catalogue Record.
title.info: This property contains a name given to the Catalogue Record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.

description.label: Description
description.help: This property contains a free-text account of the record.
description.info: This property contains a free-text account of the record. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.

license.help: The license under which the Catalogue can be used or reused.
license.info: This property refers to the license under which the Catalogue can be used or reused.
license.label: License

modified.help: The most recent date on which the Catalogue entry was changed or modified.
modified.info: This property contains the most recent date on which the Catalogue entry was changed or modified.
modified.label: Modified

publisher.label: Publisher
publisher.help: This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available.
publisher.info: This property refers to an entity (organisation) responsible for making the Dataset available.

homepage.label: Homepage
homepage.help: A web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.
homepage.info: This property refers to a web page that acts as the main page for the Catalogue.

catalogURL.label: Catalog URL
catalogURL.help: Link to catalog that contents are interesting for this catalog.

modified.info: This property contains the most recent date on which the Distribution was changed or modified.

issued.label: Issued
issued.info: This property contains the date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.
issued.help: The date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the Distribution.

format.label: Format
format.info: This property refers to the file format of the Distribution.
format.help: The file format of the Distribution.

downloadUrl.label: Download Url
downloadUrl.info: This property contains a URL that is a direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.
downloadUrl.help: Direct link to a downloadable file in a given format.

description.label: Description
description.info: This property contains a free-text account of the Distribution.
description.help: This property contains a free-text account of the Distribution.

title.label: Title
title.info: This property contains a name given to the Distribution. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description.
title.help: This property contains a name given to the Distribution.

accessUrl.label: Access Url
accessUrl.info: This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset. The resource at the access URL may contain information about how to get the Dataset.
accessUrl.help: This property contains a URL that gives access to a Distribution of the Dataset.

spatialResolutionInMeters.label: Spatial Resolution In Meters

spatialResolutionInMeters.info: This property refers to the minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset, measured in meters.
spatialResolutionInMeters.help: Minimum spatial separation resolvable in a dataset.

temporalResolutionDay.placeholder: Dataset Temporal Resolution Day placeholder text

temporalResolution.label: Temporal Resolution
temporalResolution.info: This property refers to the minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution.
temporalResolution.help: The minimum time period resolvable in the dataset distribution.

status.label: Status
status.info: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle. It MUST take one of the values Completed, Deprecated, Under Development, Withdrawn.
status.help: The status of the distribution in the context of maturity lifecycle.

language.info: This property refers to a language used in the Distribution. This property can be repeated if the metadata is provided in multiple languages.
language.help: A language used in the Distribution.
language.label: Language

packageFormat.label: Package Format
packageFormat.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together, e.g. to enable a set of related files to be downloaded together. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
packageFormat.help: The format of the file in which one or more data files are grouped together.

compressFormat.label: Compress Format
compressFormat.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
compressFormat.help: The format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form.

checksum.label: Checksum
checksum.info: This property provides a mechanism that can be used to verify that the contents of a distribution have not changed. The checksum is related to the downloadURL.
checksum.help: The checksum is related to the downloadURL.

mediaType.label: Media Type
mediaType.info: This property refers to the format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form, e.g. to reduce the size of the downloadable file. It SHOULD be expressed using a media type as defined in the official
mediaType.help: The format of the file in which the data is contained in a compressed form.

availability.label: Availability
availability.info: How long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.
availability.help: How long it is planned to keep the Distribution of the Dataset available.

byteSize.label: Byte Size
byteSize.info: This property contains the size of a Distribution in bytes.
byteSize.help: The size of a Distribution in bytes.

type.info: This property refers to the media type of the Distribution as defined in the official register of media types managed by IANA.
type.help: The media type of the Distribution.
